markdown:
<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Morlock](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=211)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #163: Ruins of Gauntlight](/Sources.aspx?ID=71) pg. 84</row>

Morlocks originate from humans long lost to the surface world. They have an affinity for machinery, scavenging, and strange occult behaviors.

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Morlock](/Monsters.aspx?ID=731) (Creature 2), [Morlock Cultist](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1039) (Creature 4), [Morlock Engineer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1038) (Creature 3), [Morlock Scavenger](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1037) (Creature 1)
name: Morlock
